summary: A care-giver at a small retirement home takes one of her patients for a drive to the country, but the two wind up stranded in a forest where they embark on an exhausting and enlightening two-day journey.
cast: Shigeki Uda|Machiko Ono|Kanako Masuda|Yôichirô Saitô|Yûsei Yamamoto|Makiko Watanabe
keywords: retirement home|forest|three word title|location in title|title directed by female
title: El bosque del luto
